section.title: Installing a basic &MiKTeX; system
section.para: Get the Basic &MiKTeX; Installer (&basicmiktexexefile;) from the download page and run it.

section.title: Installing a complete &MiKTeX; system
section.para: Get the &MiKTeXNetInstaller; (&setupexefile;) from the download page. You will use the installer to download the complete &MiKTeX; distribution. Once you have downoaded the distribution, you can install it.

section.title: Task #1: Download the complete &MiKTeX; distribution
section.para: Start the &MiKTeXNetInstaller; and choose Download MiKTeX on the task page. You will be prompted to choose an installation size (choose Complete MiKTeX), a download source and a destination directory.

tip.para: You should use a download source which is located in the proximity of you.

section.para: Depending on your Internet connection, the download can take several hours to complete. If something goes wrong, you can resume the download operation by starting the &MiKTeXNetInstaller; again.

section.title: Task #2: Install &MiKTeX;
section.para: Once the download operation is complete, you are ready to install &MiKTeX;: start &WindowsExplorer; and browse to the directory which contains the complete &MiKTeX; distribution (see previous section). Lookout for a file named setup. This is the &MiKTeX; setup application. Start setup by double-clicking its icon.
